system_description: ScanlonSoft Retail Solution. A SaaS platform running in Azure that provides point of sale retail software to small business. React frontend, with APIs hosted in Azure App Service on the backend and an Azure SQL Database.
issue_summary: Customer reports intermittent slow loading of the dashboard.

conversation_history.message: Hi, my dashboard seems to be loading slower than usual. Is there an issue?
Hello James, thank you for reaching out. Can you confirm if the issue happens consistently or just occasionally?
It’s not consistent, but it has happened a few times today.
Understood. Are you noticing this issue only with the dashboard, or do other parts of the system seem slow as well?
It seems to be just the dashboard. Everything else is working fine.
Thanks for confirming. I’ll escalate this to our engineering team for further investigation. I’ll keep you updated.
